title: Vertical Asymptotes and Denominators
text: A vertical asymptote occurs where the denominator is zero and the numerator is nonzero. Solve $$x^2-4$$ $$=$$ $$0$$.

title: Check for any Removable Discontinuities
text: A removable discontinuity occurs when both the numerator and denominator have a common factor that can be canceled out. Check if any factors cancel out after factoring.
